Reviews.Title: “Good value proposition”
Reviews.Author: hotelreview77
Reviews.Content: Great location, adequate rooms, good price. Good hotel if you are looking for basic, quick accomodatio next to the airport. Good front desk. Only minus were the grumpy Indian shuttle drivers who were unhelpful and late.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Services / stay”
Reviews.Author: slybob3
Reviews.Content: Excellent room: modern, clean comfortable, quiet. Small gym only, but great value, free parking while travelling, free rides and pickup on time from airport,,,they even track your arrival and look out for you. Saw management accommodate an airline that had diverted flight by accepting their passengers for the night. Excellent bilingual staff. Great stay, Highly recommended if coming into Montreal for flights only. Great stay over. Near main highway so easy if not familiar with surroundings.

Reviews.Title: “Efficient and clean”
Reviews.Author: GoldenTraveller
Reviews.Content: Used the park and fly package with this hotel. All went well. Hotel is clean and the rooms are fine. Shuttle service was on time. Ate at the hotel restaurant; food and service were good however costly. No other dining options without driving obvious. Early departure and so no time for breakfast, however there was ample coffee in the lobby which was greatly appreciated. Construction on the main road when we were there made getting around a bit difficult, but we managed.

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: LauloW
Reviews.Content: I am forced to stay here tonight after my flight was cancelled at YUL and I am shocked at the poor quality of my room, but even more about the state it is in! I've worked in four star hotels before, and I know how hard of a job cleaning/maintaining rooms is. But there are no excuses for this. The bathroom was so dirty. There were cleaning soap residue (green) in the sink and on the soap holders, the inside of the bath was still dirty with soap scum and dirt (and unidentified hair, my worst nightmare). Also, one of my pet peeves, there were no washcloths in the bathroom, only towels. As for the beds, they were clearly done in a rush. The sides weren't close to be even and the bedskirt was stuck under the mattress on one side. The comforter not only are the cheapest I've ever seen, they didn't look fresh at all (different colour spots - not for the look - and thread sticking out of the pattern). After all this, I had to order room service (the area isn't exactly reassuring for women travelling alone - it looks like an industrial park) and had the Cesar salad, dressing on the side. When it came, I only had romaine lettuce with dressing on the side. I had to call back for them to (promptly-I must say) bring Parmesan and bacon, they were apparently out of croutons... There is one thing I must say, check-in was pleasant and effective and the staff is courteous. Their shuttle service is practical and offers pick-ups and drop-offs to the airport every half hour, even at night! I wouldn't recommend this hotel to my worst enemy. Please don't go there.

Reviews.Title: “Park and Fly”
Reviews.Author: altarose22
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night at end of trip, parked there while away for Spring Break. Hotel is clean and well run, room clean and halls too, Used the swimming pool and whirl pool, whcih was hot - a pleasant change from most that are tepid at best. Lots of Air Canada clients there as they had delays/missed connections, which the shuttle driver said is the norm. Poorly operated company Air Canada that is!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, but Bad airport shuttle service....”
Reviews.Author: Jebelis
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice, clean and good place for a park 'n' fly place... the room was spacious, great pool, cool chocolate, but we got the car parked far behind the hotel. The dinner was great but expensive, and free cookie and newspaper was cool. Shuttle bus to the airport is a independant service from the hotel deserving both the garden Inn & Quality Inn wich is located next door... (same for the parking). OPn the way to the airport: No problemo.. On the way back.... we called for the shuttle bus and had to wait over 1 hour and half (and more tha 45 minutes on this time outside at cold) for the shuttle bus to come... we finally called 5 time the hotel and the manager of the hotelo ( nice guy) told us to take a taxi, and the hotel paid for the taxi ride and then called a shuttle ( another 45 minutes waiting!!) to bring us back to our car ( faster if we walked the path..) so a big zero for the shuttle bus service ( Unfortunately, this is why peoples mostly go to this hotel, to park and fly to a holliday destination.) The hotel manager is aware that there is a huge problem with the shuttle bus to and from the airport... i just hope it will get better for them soon, because the hotel is great, but not the shuttle bus service.....

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and comfortable bed”
Reviews.Author: Danthemannad
Reviews.Content: On our way from San Francisco, we stay one night at this hotel because our flight was the next day. Was a real comfortable hotel with great buffet in the morning for breakfast. Really closed to the airport with bus shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Robert C
Reviews.Content: I was quite pleased with the location and the excellent customer service on my recent stay at the Hilton Gargen Hotel. The room was very comfortable and the meals and service in the restaurant were first class. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty typical Hilton”
Reviews.Author: Francoise G
Reviews.Content: stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn on our way out of Montreal to Cozumel. The Park & Fly option is a good deal. Room was spacious, clean and comfortable as per Hilton standards, staff friendlynand attentive. Very convenient location to the airport and the 24 hour shuttle is handy.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Full Service”
Reviews.Author: Jim C
Reviews.Content: We stayed (7 people) at this Hitlon Garden on Christmas day on route to a family vacation. The service from the staff was great it is full service. Also a big perk is the heated indoor storage. Secure and when there service picks you up at the airport they call your car in and have it ready for you! and they give your car a quick wash! if you staying for a night before a trip you MUST stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “It's fine if you are overnighting it for a flight to/from Trudeau”
Reviews.Author: marturey
Reviews.Content: We missed our connection and the airline put us up here. It's fine if you are taking their airport shuttle to Trudeau, but if you are going to Montreal for a visit, this location is really out of the way from the downtown core. The hotel itself is nice for an airport hotel and the restaurant was attractive with a relaxed atmosphere. The room was clean and everything was no nonsense. Service was fine. It's an airport hotel, so it's kind of hard to get excited about it. In my mind, airport hotels are about utility.

Reviews.Title: “Great night sleep, unfortunate location.”
Reviews.Author: chantelle_enns
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for business purposes and was quite impressed by the decor and room amentities. The rooms are a good size, with a seating area, fridge, and king sized Sleep Number bed. The meals in the hotel restaurant are well cooked however slightly over priced. The omlete station was GREATLY appreciated, I was even able to get an egg white omlet. The staff is fantastically friendly and remember your face even if you're only staying for a short while. The unfortuante part about the hotel is the location. It was within close proximity to the location of my business contact however it is in the middle of an industrial area. I did walk across the highway to the CDL gym which is relatively safe to do as there are sidewalks but there was nothing for us to do after our work day was done. Especially if you don't drink. :) There are 2 big things I did really appreciate, the business center which has free internet access, and the availability to go to the CDL gym for free. The Hilton obviously understands that their fitness center is lacking (however works for a quick cardio session), and I greatly appreciated the opportunity to complete a full workout at CDL. All in all I had a great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Sleeping and Dining Experience - Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Stephanie W
Reviews.Content: Convenient to our work site, the hotel was beautiful and well kept. Room was comfortable, and for being somewhat close to an interstate it was sound proof, didn't hear a thing. Had dinner at Zmaya with co-workers one night, and although the main dishes were a bit pricey, the waiters and the food were excellent. We totally enjoyed ourselves Only 15 minutes from downtown, our taxi ride after the Canadians - Oilers game was only $ 30.

Reviews.Title: “HGI Montreal Airport”
Reviews.Author: Frank C
Reviews.Content: The hotel looks like all other Hilton Garden Inn's across North America. Service was excellent. Was greeted in my room with a personalized welcome in Chocolate that I have only seen at Hilton brand hotels. The restaurant was the highlight. Great staff, excellent food and selections not normally expected at the "American Grill" counterpart in US HGI properties. With this propery you get everything you expect from HGI with some extras that are normally only expected at the Hilton or double tree brands.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel near the airport - first class service!”
Reviews.Author: marymcd
Reviews.Content: I found the staff to be friendly and helpful; the rooms to be spacious and well-appointed, and the location to be OK to find. As others have mentioned, it was nice to be recognized with chocolates, and b'fast is made to order and lots of choices. I would have preferred free parking vs. the $14 billed to room, though.

Reviews.Title: “Dining experience”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn H
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful meal and great service. We especially liked the Nitro Ice Cream made at our table. The chocolate message on a plate and the fresh rose was such a nice touch when I arrived in my room. I will certainly be back.

Reviews.Title: “Best beds ever at an airport Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: KathleenI
Reviews.Content: The most comfortable bed I have ever slept in at an airport hotel. I didnt even try the adjusting that you could do. Very clean and really appreciated the little touches-the chocolates and rose, the complimentary bottled water and the excellent free coffee in the lobby early morning even with the coffee and tea in the room. My choice for any future stays for the Montreal airport. Frequent service with the shuttle every half hour- pre book the night before..

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Owen F
Reviews.Content: On a recent stay I had the opportunity to be served by Faye Ann and what a very pleasent and knwoeldgable individual she was. She made the time I spent during this evening in the louge very enjoyable. OTF

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasent”
Reviews.Author: Carl C
Reviews.Content: My stay at HGI Dorval is always a pleasent one. Hanim prepared a great omlette for me for breakfast. The staff is Always first Class, they always take a moment to welcome me and always asks about my family. when one travels as often as i do , its great to hear those words.

Reviews.Title: “Room was small but stay was Great”
Reviews.Author: markmcguire25
Reviews.Content: I was a bit put off by the size of the room, it was the smallest Hotel room I've ever stayed. Between this and the statue of Shiva in an ornate enclosure near the elevators, I had wondered what kind of Hilton property I'd booked! But the restaurant was superb (if pricey), the hotel staff was super-friendly, and my room was as clean as could be. Overall, I would highly rate this hotel for the business traveler that wants to be near the airport. A word of warning; there is no restaurant within walking distance of this hotel. And cabs in the city have a minimum rate, so if you don't plan on renting a car, this may not be a great fit, even with a very tasty restaurant on-site.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice !!!!”
Reviews.Author: Dounia E
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel was little confusing to find . the front desk staff was fantastic , i had a hvac noise complain , they couldnt fix it but they handled the issue very well. i highly recommand this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “We were very pleased with everything and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: RetiredTeacher1315
Reviews.Content: On entering the front foyer, we immediately noticed that the hotel was very clean. The decor has an attractive, oriental flair. There were beautiful, healthy-looking potted plants both inside and out. We were totally surprised by the plate of chocolates in our room, including a short welcome note, hand-written in chocolate, plus a complimentary bottle of natural spring water. The room included a fridge, microwave, coffee-maker, ironing board and iron, free wireless internet access, a huge king-size bed and a pull-out couch. The bathroom was bright and spotless. We did not use the pool, but it looked inviting, especially for kids. There is a lovely outdoor court-yard area where you can have a "bring-your-own picnic" or order from the hotel restaurant/bar. We enjoyed a reasonably-priced, delicious, buffet-style breakfast, available from 6:30 to 10:00 am; all prepared and served by a very friendly, courteous staff. Our tasty dinner was served with a complimentary glass of wine. There was ample parking, with 24 hours in-and-out privileges, but we had to pay a fee. Everyone on staff was very friendly and seemed fluently bilingual in both English and French. All-in-all, we were very pleased with our stay and will definitely book again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Fine place to stay”
Reviews.Author: wggty
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here the night of U2's first concert in Montreal. Rooms were clean, quiet and fairly spacious. There were welcome chocolates in our room which was nice. This is a good hotel if you don't need to use public transit -- if you do, choose something more central that's near a metro line because this one isn't even near a bus stop.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: zanezed
Reviews.Content: This is a reliable airport hotel. Its clean and comfortable, and reasonably up-to-date. I had a room on the main floor and it was quiet. I hear the rooms upstairs may be a little nicer and have flat screen TV's. The restuarant is nice, with great food and excellent service - the breakfast buffet is also really nice @ $15. The staff are pleasant and friendly - very welcoming. The fitness centre is clean and with new equipment but is a little small. Pool looks nice, I did not have time to try it. The hotel offers access to a large gym close by but I did not go. The hotel has a shuttle to and from the airport, you have to call for a pick-up. I suspect that this hotel is a little nicer than the other Dorval airport hotels based on the recent reviews here.

Reviews.Title: “Stay often & will return without hesitation!”
Reviews.Author: Dave17311
Reviews.Content: Always an excellent experience. Comfortable, clean, friendly & first rate staff!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for a night or two”
Reviews.Author: psc4106
Reviews.Content: Nothing special unless you count 'Welcome' written in chocolate syrup on a plate with a couple mints in your room when you check in. Other than that it was just what I needed for an overnight... no surprises, Hilton quality.

Reviews.Title: “special”
Reviews.Author: abapaz
Reviews.Content: personalized attention, unique. clean..overall good value..will return. Only downside is the paid parking.

Reviews.Title: “Bird droppings (sh**) all over my car!!!”
Reviews.Author: fortin69
Reviews.Content: I took the sleep and fly package and left my car for a week in their parking lot. When I came back, my car was full of bird droppings... and when I say full, it is very full!!! And all other cars in the parking lot were full of it also. Now, I need to clean my car by hands because some droppings where still on my car after a carwash as there were so much of it on my car. Also, the parking lot is supposed to be locked. But, when I came out, nobody asked me anything and they opened the door for us. The guy from the bus even told us, after I told him that I was frustrated my car was full of bird droppings, "at least, you are lucky, your car is still there", as if car where stollen in this parking lot sometimes. I do not recommand anybody to leave his car there!

Reviews.Title: “Treated with class”
Reviews.Author: Dwayne155004
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed one night at this hotel for the purpose of flying to Mexico the following day. We had dinner at the hotel restaurant and were impressed with the service and quality of food. The price is also reasonable. The following morning, we were shuttled to the Airport right on time. When we got back from our trip, the shuttle was already waiting for us and drove us back to our car that had been parked at the hotel for seven days. They even removed the snow on the vehicle and warm it up before we took possession of it. This is great service. Not having to drive and parked at the airport is worth the stay at this hotel. We will definitely do this again, itâ€™s like extending your vacation by one day. Dwayne, Rockland, Ontario

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Weerobbie
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located close to shopping malls, the highway and restaurants. The check-in was superb with a very friendly welcome. The room was extremely spacious and comfortable for the stay and working. It was very clean with good beds. The bathroom was alright and very clean. The lounge had terrific service although the ambience is more business than romance. It was a very pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay for your money”
Reviews.Author: Hullgirl
Reviews.Content: Sometimes hotels just get it all right. This is true for this property. The hotel itself is very nice, standard to alot of it's competitors. What made my visit was the efficiency and customer service. We stayed one night, booked an airport shuttle and parked our car there on the property while we were away. The room was very clean, the wifi worked no problem. The only thing I would warn you about is that the food is very over-priced. I would recommend just using restaurants nearby. ( we went to Tim Hortons). When we came home a week later, a quick toll free call from the airport and the free shuttle was there in minutes, and took us to the parking garage where the valet hosed down our car, removed all of the snow and warmed it up for us! All for no extra charge! Talk about being treated like royalty. I'd recommend this property to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: truetous
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent hotel. The rooms are spacious with microwave, fridge and basic utensils. High speed complimentary internet connection plus a wired connection. The staff went out of their way to help. Restaurant food is excellent and for long term stays you get a discount card for food you eat in the restaurant. Overall, a top notch property. On checking in, I found a welcome plate with my name written in chocolate and some delightful treats in the room. It was a great start to what was a wonderful stay

Reviews.Title: “Nasty view and Nasty Housekeeper”
Reviews.Author: sharono11
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two nights in this hotel and found many things to be terrible. The room's view was of a graffti covered abandoned building, the elevators were very slow, the crowd for breakfast grumpy and enormous and the housekeeper nasty! The rooms only was stocked with two bath towels and they knew there would be four of us staying in the room.I went out one morning to look for the housekeeper which i found to be right outside my door I was simply looking at the cart for an extra towel and she charged out the room she was servicing and started yelling at me in french, i asked her for one extra bath towel and continued to mumble something in french.The next morning while waiting for the slow elevators she came out of the closet with her cart and gave me a nasty look. Also, don't forget your key when ever you leave the room especially if you need ice, the machines are located on every other floor and the stairways automatically lock when you shut them so you need to use the elevators to back up one floor which took me 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “Simply Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: Dovxcs
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, cleaniness, value for our money. During our stay we enjoyed the beauty of the city and hospitality. We may not come to Montreal in near future, but we will suggest our friends to visit Montreal and stay at this beautiful hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel and hot breakfast”
Reviews.Author: 2BoysHockeyMom
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with a hockey team and got a larger room with a queen bed and sofabed divided by a room divider. There were 2 flat screens, a fridge and microwave. Very spacious and clean. The room faced the back so it was quiet. The front lobby was spacious with couches and a comfortable breakfast eating area (complete with TV) . Unfortunately, the hotel tried to make the hockey team guests eat in a conference room which didn't have the same breakfast selection (they neglected to leave orange juice and some other more expensive food items). We noticed this and went back to the regular area to eat all of the food. The pool was good. Parking was gated and the room card didn't work to let us out so we had to page the front desk to exit. Tim Hortons was a short block away but nothing else was in the area as it was in an industrial area. You needed to drive to get to stores or restaurants. A short drive from here was a small plaza at 475 Dumont in Dorval. They had a great Sushi restaurant we ate at. There was also a Tim Hortons, Dominoes pizza and M&M's. Would probably stay here again if we were in the area but make sure you use your navigation system as it's difficult to get to off the small highway.

Reviews.Title: “Not a good example of the HGI brand.”
Reviews.Author: Iceair614
Reviews.Content: It's not every day that I check out of a hotel after a couple of hours, but my colleague and I did. We had stayed the week in town at the Marriott, but as it was Grand Prix weekend, we had to move for one night to complete our trip. We had planned on staying the night and got to hotel around 4 and went to relax after a long week and day of meetings. I was surprised as a HH Diamond that I got a room behind the elevator and found it to be very noisy with elevator constantly going...combined with the highway noise, aircraft noise (its very near the PE Trudeau airport) and then when I thought I heard it all, the train came by. The rooms were in poor order, with damaged furniture and lamp shades. We independently decided to just drive home in the middle of the night, then spend the night. This was the poorest example of the HGI brand, that I have experienced. Parking is about $15 CAD/day. The big Buddha in the lobby and the religious literature in the room, was a slight turnoff also.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Service”
Reviews.Author: Johnsr55
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night and found the service to be quite good from reception to a welcome plate of chocolates in our room. The king size bed was great and the room was very clean, quiet and reasonably large. The restaurant had good service as well and the food was quite nice.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: Lefty_59
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for only one (1) night because we were able to leave our car here while we were gone to Chile. We were given a very good rate if compared to other hotels in the area. The service, the room, the location, etc. exceeded by far what we had expected. Since we were in Chile when the earthquake happened, someone called the hotel to tell them that our return date might change and there was no mention of a surcharge. I would definitely consider staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have asked for a better stay.”
Reviews.Author: roberin
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel as a necessary stop during a long journey and are so glad we did! No problem with language: the front desk greeting we received (including a glass of sparkling wine upon arrival) was warm, welcoming, efficient and helpful. The room was well equipped with a comfy bed, a fridge & microwave (plus dishes supplied for breakfast, I suppose), a great shower and nice bedding. We feared that proximity to the airport & highway might make for a noisy night/morning but our worries were unfounded. We'll definitely seek out Hilton Garden Inns in the future. What a lovely surprise for weary travellers!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: travelerjs08
Reviews.Content: Despite its boring location in an industrial park, I'm rating this hotel highly. The staff are helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. There is on-site parking (paid) and transportation to the airport and nearby business. There is a small on-site fitness center, but they offer the use of a full fitness center across the street. Shopping and restaurants are within driving distance, or the hotel shuttle can be reserved. Free wireless internet is also offered.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, extra perks”
Reviews.Author: marchbreakneeded
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Hilton Garden Inn for stopover for March Break trip- checked in with a free glass of champagne, quick service. Up to room, Neutrogena products, a plate with my name in chocolate lettering. Wonderful room, comfy beds. Would recommend any time. Parking included for trip- gated, fenced area, friendly shuttle driver

Reviews.Title: “Decent - better than expected”
Reviews.Author: Kali08
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hilton Garden Inn from August 15 - 17, 2008. The rooms were clean and housecleaning came in once a day to tidy up. The food at the restaurant was decent though higher priced than it should be. For example, the breakfast buffet was around $15/person and it's pricey for people like me who don't eat greasy food first thing in the morning. There were healthier choices like fruit, juices, bread, cheese and coldcuts. The hotel's best feature was the shuttle. We had some initial confusion because we thought the hotel shuttle came automatically at certain times to the airport. We ended up waiting at the airport for a while until we realized we had to call it. The shuttle service also took us to the Metro and picked us up so we could take the subway downtown. One of the shuttle drivers was surly but there are unhappy people in every job. This hotel is not located near anything in Montreal. It's far enough from the airport and far enough from the touristy things that I would not recommend it for someone who is coming into town for sightseeing. I will be visiting Montreal again but I would not stay at this particular Hilton Garden Inn again due to the location. I'd definitely stay at another Hilton Garden Inn based on the service I received here.

Reviews.Title: “Safe and Sound”
Reviews.Author: asianam
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel based on favorable trip advisor reviews. Basically I stayed for less than 9 hours due to flight schedules, so I wanted to be close to the airport. My room was spacious, the service was excellent and efficient. The hotel restaurant food was somewhat pricey for the pre-fixe dinners (but other offerings of casual food were less expensive) and my trout dinner was decent. As a woman staying there alone, I felt safe and the room was very clean. The complimentary airport shuttle service was good and made it worthwhile to pay $176 plus tax Canadian for the room. My only complaint would be the scent (deodorizer aromatic) that may have been in the carpet cleaning. I had to keep my window open and shut off the room air/fan as I am sensitive to perfume and aromatics that hotels seem to be using a lot these days. The same problem with aromatics in the room air happened at the Hotel Nelligan in Vieux Montreal when I stayed there in early August 2008. Overall, I would stay at this hotel again...I like having windows that open, even if they face busy streets.

Reviews.Title: “Great food and sleep”
Reviews.Author: GeoffL
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 4 nights in June. The room they gave me 3029 has the most comfortable king size bed I have ever slept in, I almost couldn't get up to go to work. Also, I have a rule that I never eat at the hotel I am staying but I broke that rule one night because I was too tired to go out, so II had a lobster dinner that was inbelievably delicious. The staff at the restaurant and bar are excellent. I definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Hard to find better!”
Reviews.Author: Limablu
Reviews.Content: Chose this hotel after seeing the great reviews it had on Trip Advisor. We needed something close to Montrealâ€™s Dorval Airport, a park and fly arrangement and an interior pool for the kids. This hotel fit the bill. In my opinion youâ€™d be hard pressed to find a better deal then this. The rate for one night with two weeks of parking ended up costing us less than what it would have cost for parking alone at Dorval Airport. We were greeted by a friendly and very polite staff (donâ€™t know what happened to the previous reviewer who had issues with the staff). We were served Champagne (actually sparkling wine) and chocolates were left in our room on a plate with a personalised welcome message written in liquid chocolate! The room had a good size, the bathroom was pretty and the beds and pillows were very comfortable. The pool was a tad cool but the adjacent spa made up for that. Everything was very clean. The wake up call as well as the transportation between the hotel and airport (both ways) were done in a timely manner. On our return to the hotel, staff drove us to our car (hotel parking being full at the time of our arrival, we were actually parked a 5-minute walk away) and waited until I got my car started before they left. Class act all the way. Great amenities, great staff and good price. What more can one ask for. We didnâ€™t try the hotelâ€™s inhouse restaurantâ€¦ perhaps next time. We filled in a comments form and shortly after our return home we received a thank you letter stemming from the comments we left behind. These people really want us to return! Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was excellent, but the staff 0 % !”
Reviews.Author: Pellerin177
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very excellent but the staff were very mean and they need more training. They didn't smile me ONCE during my trip in MontrÃ©al. The manager should train his staffs or maybe, the manager is the problem has I read in the other reviews! 90 % Global Note!

Reviews.Title: “better than your usual airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: aeromom
Reviews.Content: This was a nice little hotel with excellent service. The manager obviously has put a lot of effort into staff training, and the little extras: glass of champagne upon check-in, daily news bulletin, follow-up phone call to see how my stay was going, etc. etc. Convenient location if you're visiting one of the many aerospace companies located nearby, they even have a free shuttle. Generic but nice room typical of the Garden Inns. Appears to be a newer property, too.

Reviews.Title: “Not opulant but very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: johnjudge
Reviews.Content: Stayed for three nights. Room was clean, comfortable with a Scandanavian flair. The dresser with the frosted glass top lit from below was interesting. I liked the large shower (sorry no tub in our room or any?) with the heavy rimless glass enclosure. Acutally the bath was also interesting for it's tile that was not very cold to the touch and ample glass shelving too. Our room faced the runway and from a relatively short distance. It was fascinating to watch the jets fly by the window close enough for Tiger Woods to hit them with a ball and hardly a whisper or rumble. Parking was a little odd with tickets in and out but no attendants... but the round shape of the hotel meant lots of parking close to where YOU wanted. This is NOT the Four Seasons, or near downtown (10-12 minutes by car). This is a great reasonably priced attracitve room at the airport and took our dog and had lots of space to walk a dog. My room looked exactly like the ones on the hotel website.

Reviews.Title: “Unsurpassed Service”
Reviews.Author: asrosen
Reviews.Content: I was very pleasantly surprised at the high quality of the hotel, the excellent service and attitude of the staff, and the good Thai food in the restaurant. My room was very nice. The service orientation of the staff and the numerous little positive touches were quite unusual: champagne at check-in, free broadband connections (not so unusual any more), call from the front desk following the automated wake-up call to be sure I received it! The Thai dish I had at dinner the first night was quite good. On the basis of that experience, I ordered the flat bread pizza the next night, but found it to be mediocre. I was told by the very professional and loyal front-desk staff about how they tend to be filled and welcome mostly repeat visitors during the week, and it was easy for me to understand why. I look forward to staying here again on my next business trip to Montreal.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I spent 90 days last summer and fall(yes, a very long stay) in this hotel and I recomend this place to anyone that reads this review. It is very quiet and peacefull. The staff is polite, the food is good and allways fresh. The waiters are good, they do not necessary ask for tips (as I read in other review). The rooms are big and nice. Too bad the TV cable selection is missing any of the Discovery family programs. This is the only complaint I would have about this hotel. Thank guys, kip it up!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: margebs
Reviews.Content: My husband, daughter and I had a fantastic stay at the Hilton Garden Inn! Apparently, the hotel is undergoing renovations. Our spacious room was clean and nicely decorated. My husband said it was larger than ones he has previously stayed in at the hotel. I believe they may have given us a larger room because we had our two year old daughter with us. Our daughter had only a 20 minute nap and was a bit grumpy when we arrived at the hotel. When we got to our room there was a blue rubber ducky waiting in the bathroom for her. This put her in a very good mood! Then, when the housekeeper came to set up her crib he said he forgot her special treat and letter so he left and returned 15 minutes later. He laid a small teddy bear and a letter in her crib. Needless to say my daughter's mood improved even more. The letter stated that they had diapers, bottles, bibs etc.. free of charge, by chance we had forgotten any of these items. We have stayed at many hotels domestically, and internationally with our daughter and no where else have we found so much thoughtfullness toward the smallest of travellers. My husband is also a gold member with Hilton so we were on the 6th floor which was adjacent to a guest lounge. Cocktails and O'doervs were provided in the lounge on the seventh floor until 11pm and a continental breakfast was available in the morning. This worked out great for us. We fed our daughter, and I got her ready for bed while my husband went out to find an italian restaraunt with take out for us. We were able to sit in the lounge area outside our room, have dinner and a drink, while our daughter slept. The staff members were all very friendly and I can't think of one negavtive comment to make about our stay. Marge From VT

Reviews.Title: “Watch Your Wallet”
Reviews.Author: CaliforniaPenguin
Reviews.Content: This hotel erroneously took our July phone reservations for nights in June, never told us when we arrived in July, then billed us as a no show when we were not even in the country. When disputed, they very rudely denied their error and used their accounting records as "proof" of a booking. Corporate Hilton had no record in their system of the June bookings. Bottom line: do not make phone reservations directly with this property.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Oasis!”
Reviews.Author: TEEMILL
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night after a transatlantic flight. This is a really nice hotel right at the airport door! The check-in clerk was excellent and got us into our requested room without delay. The room was a great size and extremely comfortable. The hotel provide a shuttle to and from the airport which was very efficient and great for the next morning when we returned to Dorval to collect our hire car! All the staff were very helpful and polite, a great start to our trip!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel - recommended”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on business. Right by the airport with free shuttle every 10-15 minutes - extremely convenient. Very friendly staff. The food was so-so, nothing special. Good breakfast. Nice interior - spacious with a relaxed feel despite it being a business hotel. Would definitely stay here again on business; no complaints. Not for leisure though because it's pretty far from Montreal.
